sequence:
Fight On, Royal Maids!

<size=45>Begin the Operation!</size>

scripts.say: Do I make myself clear, Bel? I won't tolerate failure on this mission!
We may have allowed the Eagle Union to hog the spotlight with their Christmas party, but the most effective way to prove that the Royal Navy is the mightiest faction here is through a show of force!
At the upcoming joint exercises, make sure that everyone trembles before our might!
In any case, that is what Her Majesty said...
So I must cross swords with my honourable Master's fleet once more...
So that's why you called for all of us?
I have no objections to facing off against Master's fleet, but... controlling the amount of force will take some finesse...
Well, we've already done this once before, so let's not take this too seriously~
That may be the case, but as these are the Queen's orders, I can't afford to hold back.
Indeed. Regarding that matter, I've consulted with Belfast and made some adjustments to the personnel who will be handling this important mission.
I'm a bit concerned... I just arrived at the base, and I already have to fight against my Master's fleet...
Will Dido also be cast aside like this child here...
Don't worry. Those are the actual orders that Her Majesty gave.
*fidgets*
In other words, I'll be supporting the Royal Maids and... fighting against my Master's fleet?
Demonstrate the glory of the Royal Navy, help improve everyone's skills, and improve communication between members of the fleet...
...and most importantly, prove to my Master that I can fulfill any request, no matter the situation...?
Understood! For the sake of Her Majesty and my Master, I will give it my all!
What a monster...
She's the right person for the job. If Belfast or I were to handle this job, we'd end up subconsciously holding back against the Master.
In contrast, Dido should be able to perfectly balance her obligations to the Queen, to the Maid Team, as well as to the Master, and therefore perform to her utmost.
Indeed. I suppose we'll be taking a back seat this time.
...The Master's fleet will be arriving soon. Everyone, prepare for battle.
